__e: I know, I know. I don't want him dead.
Then again, maybe one of us won't.
You hadn't seen him in years, and yet you say he was an old friend.
I don't care if she buys a house or a rocket. Or just nail it up and look at it.
It was so long ago it's hard to remember.
I don't care what other wives do, only the one I'm married to.
Dear young creature of the New World I don't mean across the city. I mean across the ocean.
It ain't much, but it's all I got in the world.
You're not the only person in the world got to use a bathroom.
But don't worry, we all have to grow up someday.
I suppose we occasionally had our little disagreements, but when you work with somebody for 20 years you can't always be expected to see... to see... I mean, to see eye to eye.
If you don't mind I'd just like to be alone for a while longer.
I don't really have much to give you, but...
I saw something, but I'm not quite sure what it was.
Well, to tell you the truth I havert got any friends around here.
"Why can't a woman be like me?"
Yes, why can't a woman be more like a man?
"Well, why can't a woman be like us?"
